|Title=Knowing how to detect tobacco use
|Description=Knowing the question to ask and assessing consumption and objectives (stopping)
|Rubric=Positive diagnosis
|Contributors=
|Order=19}}
All patients should have their tobacco consumption assessed and monitored.

* Simple screening: "Do you smoke?" followed by a decision algorithm until you stop.
* Smoking assessment: ''Packs-Year (PA) = number of packs/day x number of years of intoxication''.

properties.question: Know how to detect tobacco use
properties.option_a: Assess the consequences of tobacco use
properties.option_b: Understand the importance of quitting tobacco use
properties.option_c: Identify the benefits of a tobacco-free life
properties.option_d: Understand the risk of nicotine dependence
properties.correct_option: Assess the consequences of tobacco use
